Getting started is easy

Earn Stars and get rewarded in a few easy steps.

1

Create an account

Join in the appto get access to the full range of Starbucks Rewards benefits. You can also join online.

2

Order and pay how you;d like

Use cash, credit/debit card or save some time and pay right through the app. You'll collect Stars all ways. Learn how

3

Earn Stars, get Rewards

As you earn Stars, you can redeem them for Rewards-- like free food, drinks, and more. Star redeeming with as little as 25 Stars!.

Cash or card, you earn Stars

No matter how you pay, you can earn Stars with morning coffee. Those Stars add up to(really delicious) Rewards.

1★ per dollar Pay as you go

Scan and pay separately

Use cash or credit/debit card at the register.

Save payment in the app

Check-out faster by saving a credit/debit card or PayPal to your account. You’ll be able to order ahead or scan and pay at the register in one step.

2★ per dollar Add funds in the app

Preload

To save time and earn Stars twice as fast, add money to your digital Starbucks Card using any payment option. Scan and pay in one step or order ahead in the app.

Register your gift card

Then use it to pay through the app. You can even consolidate balances from multiple cards in one place.
